page.title: 07Clubs in Thornton Dale Area
page.content: {Village Hall.}A local drama group puts on an annual show at Christmas.Other entertainments include card-playing, bingo,snooker,Keep-Fit and evening classes.About 2 dozen people attend weekly Adult Education Art classes which last for 2 hours on Wednesday afternoons.{Sports Clubs}include bowls football,cricket, badminton,squash and tennis.{Pickering Arts Club}meets to paint, draw and sculpt. They put on an annual show.{Art Galleries. }There are several in Thornton and Pickering. {Pickering Musical Society }has converted a disused chapel into the Kirk Theatre, and a number of residents belong to the group.
